医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AGA 宣布支持重新引入《治疗和减少肥胖法》美国胃肠病学协会 (AGA) 今天宣布支持重新引入《治疗和减少肥胖法案》(TROA)，该法案将扩大医疗保险覆盖范围，将各类专门从事肥胖症护理的医疗保健提供者提供的肥胖症筛查和治疗纳入其中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/AGA-announces-support-for-the-reintroduced-Treat-and-Reduce-Obesity-Act.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/AGA-announces-support-for-the-reintroduced-Treat-and-Reduce-Obesity-Act.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6280bb29-b311-4b09-87d5-247229b3e54f Thu, 03 Aug 2023 12:01:51 -0400 AGA announces support for the reintroduced Treat and Reduce Obesity Act
Insilico Medicine 的新人工智能工具在预测临床试验结果方面显示出前景Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家临床阶段端到端生成人工智能（AI）药物发现公司，已证明它可以使用其专有的基于变压器的技术来预测 II 期至 III 期临床试验的成功结果人工智能临床试验预测工具inClinico，具有很高的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Insilico-Medicines-new-AI-tool-shows-promise-in-predicting-clinical-trial-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Insilico-Medicines-new-AI-tool-shows-promise-in-predicting-clinical-trial-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7efd410b-db70-410d-98b7-0dd55a99d4c3 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 11:58:04 -0400 Insilico Medicine's new AI tool shows promise in predicting clinical trial outcomes
生活质量是心力衰竭死亡和住院的独立预测因素宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。心力衰竭 (HF) 通常与生活质量 (QoL) 差相关。描述中国心力衰竭患者健康相关生活质量 (HRQL) 的数据有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Quality-of-life-is-an-independent-predictor-of-death-and-hospitalization-in-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Quality-of-life-is-an-independent-predictor-of-death-and-hospitalization-in-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74b8aba4-e7c7-45d5-a16a-0bc35d8cdfcc Thu, 03 Aug 2023 11:48:37 -0400 Quality of life is an independent predictor of death and hospitalization in heart failure
纳米工程生物墨水提高肿瘤模型的准确性Terasaki 生物医学创新研究所的科学家开发了一种纳米工程生物墨水，具有改进的粘合和交联能力，可用于肿瘤模型的 3D 生物打印。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Nanoengineered-bioink-improves-tumor-model-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Nanoengineered-bioink-improves-tumor-model-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76f9ffe0-e3de-483e-aa5d-747b12a28c2e Thu, 03 Aug 2023 11:40:00 -0400 Nanoengineered bioink improves tumor model accuracy
针对多个 Omicron 亚系的有效双特异性抗体的冷冻电镜结构和功能研究人员使用 Cryo-EM 表征了针对多种 Omicron 亚变体的有效双特异性抗体的结构和功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Cryo-EM-structs-and-functions-of-potted-bispecial-antibodies-against-multiple-Omicron-sublineages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Cryo-EM-structs-and-functions-of-potted-bispecial-antibodies-against-multiple-Omicron-sublineages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9c914e4-9d3e-4e63-a98f-eac22b551087 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 11:04:00 -0400 Cryo-EM structures and functions of potent bispecific antibodies against multiple Omicron sublineages
COVID-19 大流行期间女孩性早熟的人数有所增加根据《内分泌学会杂志》发表的一项新研究，由于潜在的风险因素（例如屏幕时间增加和体力活动减少），在 COVID-19 大流行期间被诊断为性早熟的女孩数量有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Precocious-puberty-on-the-rise-in-girls-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Precocious-puberty-on-the-rise-in-girls-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1883f25-6603-4f40-8f96-08487ace593b Thu, 03 Aug 2023 10:32:00 -0400 Precocious puberty on the rise in girls during COVID-19 pandemic
在农村地区长大的孩子有更好的免疫系统调节能力一项新的研究发现，在农村环境中长大的孩子，与生活在城市环境中的孩子相比，在户外度过大量时间并接触动物的孩子的免疫系统会得到更好的调节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Children-raised-in-rural-areas-have-better-regulated-immune-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Children-raised-in-rural-areas-have-better-regulated-immune-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac972fb3-91ab-4948-982a-9db00dfd41ab Thu, 03 Aug 2023 10:29:06 -0400 Children raised in rural areas have better regulated immune systems
研究揭示了一种几乎只发生在男孩身上的罕见疾病背后的机制渥太华大学领导的一个研究小组发表了严谨的新研究，推进了对一种令人费解且令人心碎的极其罕见疾病的探索，这种疾病几乎只发生在男孩身上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Study-sheds-light-on-mechanisms-behind-a-rare-disease-found-almost-exclusively-in-boys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Study-sheds-light-on-mechanisms-behind-a-rare-disease-found-almost-exclusively-in-boys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efb28574-c9c3-4248-8480-577e46b55dd6 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 10:28:33 -0400 Study sheds light on mechanisms behind a rare disease found almost exclusively in boys
研究发现基于虚拟现实的练习可以减少血液透析患者的抑郁和焦虑研究人员确定了基于虚拟现实（VR）的定期体育锻炼与抑郁症发展之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Virtual-reality-based-exercises-found-to-reduce-depression-and-anxiety-among-individuals-treatment-with-hemodialysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Virtual-reality-based-exercises-found-to-reduce-depression-and-anxiety-among-individuals-treatment-with-hemodialysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e263395-1566-443a-96d3-7bf3b908e86e Thu, 03 Aug 2023 10:28:00 -0400 Virtual reality-based exercises found to reduce depression and anxiety among individuals treated with hemodialysis
美国国立卫生研究院拨款 1800 万美元用于开发新型基孔肯雅疫苗Access to Advanced Health Institute (AAHI) 今天宣布，它已获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的 1800 万美元资助，用于开发针对基孔肯雅病毒的温度稳定、单剂量候选疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/NIH-awards-2418-million-to-develop-novel-chikungunya-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/NIH-awards-2418-million-to-develop-novel-chikungunya-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37191530-fbf0-443d-b98b-ebf4c2e029bf Thu, 03 Aug 2023 10:08:39 -0400 NIH awards $18 million to develop novel chikungunya vaccine
